entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
